meanings.sent1: The knight showed stoutheartedness in facing the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She displayed stoutheartedness when standing up to the bully.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, the puppy's stoutheartedness in protecting his owner was admirable.
meanings.sent4: Her stoutheartedness was like a shining beacon in the darkness of fear.
meanings.sent5: The stoutheartedness of the firefighter rushing into the burning building left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: The quality of being resolute or determined
meanings.sent1: His stoutheartedness in pursuing his dreams never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The team's stoutheartedness led them to victory against all odds.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's stoutheartedness in stealing nuts from the bird feeder was both daring and comical.
meanings.sent4: In the face of adversity, her stoutheartedness was a rock that others leaned on.
meanings.sent5: The stoutheartedness of the explorer venturing into the unknown was truly inspiring.
